original_title: Gazette issued detailing functions and duties of new Ministries
original_body_lines: The Gazette notification outlining the respective subjects, functions, duties, and institutions of the newly established ministries has been published.
The Extraordinary Gazette notification has been issued by President Anura Kumara Dissanayake on Friday (September 27).
Gazette issued detailing functions and duties of new Ministries by Adaderana Online on Scribd
